eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: San Miguel, CO; AT 02:45 PM ON SEP 13, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 03:15 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: The National Weather Service (@nws) has confirmed it is safe to return to Telluride Town Park and resume the 31st Annual Telluride Blues & Brews Festival. Gates will reopen at 3:45 pm, and music will resume at 4:00 pm. Please be patient as long queues are expected as attendees return to the park. Due to the lightning delay, the Town of Telluride has approved an extended curfew for music on the Town Park stage tonight through 10:30 pm.
